BRIEF-Allegiance Coal Updates On Private Placement

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 11:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Allegiance Coal Updates On Private Placement Sept 23 (Reuters) - Allegiance Coal Ltd : * RECEIVED BINDING COMMITMENTS FOR $3.08 MILLION, BEFORE COSTS, PURSUANT TO A PRIVATE PLACEMENT * ALSO OFFERING SHAREHOLDERS A SHARE PURCHASE PLAN TO RAISE UP TO A FURTHER $3 MILLION, AT $0.14 PER SHARE * PROCEEDS WILL BE APPLIED PRINCIPALLY TO COMPLETE FEASIBILITY STUDY AND FORMAL PURCHASE OF NEW ELK HARD COKING COAL MINE
